title: REKT LFM
body:
REKT5
Learning and forming a team, looking for a few roles.... We have some filled already.

We want active players who play most afternoons \ nights, particularly Sundays, Mondays and Tuesdays.

Looking for a Support and a Jungle, willing to work as a team and improve... Generally get better!!

Discord and activity are the only Requirements!

replies.body: I would be interested, started this season Bronze IV, then hit Silver 1, but went now Silver IV, I'm mostly a one trick support main huge champion pool, and mostly play aggressive. (Flex Silver V) - IGN birdious
I'm interested I'm a gold 5 currently and was silver 2 last year. My main role is adc. I have discord aswell.

Plat 5 but an ADC main.. 

Add me if interested : VÃ¡yne bot
We aren't that high up but one trick champion isn't good for learning and moving forward imo?
What are the rank requirements? I'm an Evelynn Jungle one-trick, but am in Bronze. I'm presuming you want Plat/Diamond players?
